attributes.action: Abandon the idea of Home Information Packs (Hips)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Home Information Packs (HIPS) are an unnecessary addition to the red tape surrounding the home buying process. HIPS could dissuade thousands of property owners from putting their properties on the market creating instability in the marketplace and adding further fuel to house price inflation.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Abandon the idea of Home Information Packs (Hips)."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12790.asp

Prime Minister's Office
